website_summaries.verdict: A mobile stack of 10 whiteboards that easily fit into someone’s lap.
pros: Great for school, homework, or office use
9 x 12-inch profile fits comfortably in the laps of children and adult
The 2-inch felt eraser is small enough to keep close by without taking up too much space or getting other surfaces dirty
cons: Felt erasers sometimes peel off and retain the smell of dry erase marker

customer_reviews.title: The boards are great but the erasers do not work AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Great customer service! I had some issues with the erasers not working properly but the company replaced them for me and sent some new dry erase markers. The product now functions great. The only thing is that the erasers still do not work with the original expo markers I purchased. Other than that I love the product. ORIGINAL REVIEW: The boards are great but the erasers do not work AT ALL. I'm shocked there's no reviews listing this issue. I have to use water to wipe the boards clean which is an extra and pain in the butt step. Any suggestions as to how to effectively and easily clean the boards for efficient use would be much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Saves Paper
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. The boards are easy to handle and wipe clean easily. I work from home at a job where I have 8-10 projects going on at a time. I use these boards to track the status and upcoming to-do's on the various projects. Project status changes daily, often minute to minute. Instead of grabbing a notebook or sheet of paper to jot down notes that I then throw away, I use these boards. It works great and saves stacks of wasted and disorganized paper on my desk. I use fine point dry erase markers also sold on this site.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: this set of 10 is pretty darn perfect for a classroom (we homeschool) and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Boards arrived quickly, and as described. The set of boards is slightly warped, each board being slightly convex instead of flat. Also, they stained a little quicker than I expected. That said, this set of 10 is pretty darn perfect for a classroom (we homeschool) and I really appreciate that they came with a full set of erasers.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt LoLo

customer_reviews.title: They clean up easily and don’t leave marks!”,
customer_reviews.text: I have an in home daycare of 5 preschool children that I keep all day Monday thru Friday. I do “school work” with them. Other white boards that I have had there was always marks that would not come off and I had to use a cleaner on it. The little erasers do a great job cleaning. Some colors might need a little more pressure to get off than others but the kids can do it!yay! They are a great size for little hands and big hands. The box is a great feature bc I store the markers in with the boards and erasers. Great set up. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: P Pinkstaff

customer_reviews.title: BAD Quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst quality products I've purchased through Amazon! The white boards are not flat at all so the students are spinning the white boards instead of writing on it. Plus the cloth on the eraser came off right away after the first use. Do NOT recommend this product. Find something else that costs more but lasts MUCH longer instead!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence, but I'm really glad I bought these; great value for the price. I am using them for sketching out ideas for software programming and various math problems in lieu of wasting paper. Each board is pretty heavy and seems like it could take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect resource for my small classroom!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for my classroom! The boards came in great condition, complete with erasers intact. The packaging is very compact and convenient for storage in my small room. Thank you! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I used the Expo dry erase markers and it worked perfectly. Had no issues with erasing cleanly. Looking forward to using them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: I use post it notes and blank papers to write down things while I work. No need anymore! These are great for writing down to-do lists and notes. Fast, clean and easy! No more papertrash. I love them. And our kids love them too. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Saija

customer_reviews.title: Great for a smaller class/ teacher set.
customer_reviews.text: If I was going to use these in the classroom, I would probably buy two sets. They are exactly as pictured and they have worked well so far. They clean up easily and have not become scratched yet! This is a great teacher resource!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Mora

customer_reviews.title: but they are not the best quality I've had
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about 3 months. They do the job, but they are not the best quality I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Tullos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Product at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to donate to my daughter's 1st grade class. They have stood up over a 6 month period. Will definitely purchase again if 2nd grade needs them.
customer_reviews.author: tshinn777

customer_reviews.title: ... our Title I teacher was looking for - a great size for students' smaller laps
customer_reviews.text: These dry erase boards are exactly what our Title I teacher was looking for - a great size for students' smaller laps!
customer_reviews.author: Elementary School Secretary

customer_reviews.title: My product arrived on time and everything was in great conditions. Writing on the boards feel great and ...
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived on time and everything was in great conditions. Writing on the boards feel great and they get cleaned easily. The product is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chainland-The-Moose

customer_reviews.title: Great Boards....great quality
customer_reviews.text: These boards are great! They wipe off so easily and clean.....other boards seem to leave a bit of a shadow of previous information, but these look brand new when you wiped clean with the erasers. they are great for kids to use for art work, recently kept a 3 year old and 5 year old busy with them. they drew, colored and were very happy ....... I highly recommend.....

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my classroom. We use them as whiteboards and turn over for a lap table.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. They have lasted the whole year with 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They have lasted the whole year with 30 4th graders. The kids destroyed the erasers, but the white boards still look great and at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids. The erasers had a really weird smell to them but they work well. My kids like them.
customer_reviews.author: Skye51712

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great! No complaints
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a trivia night activity for our students. The quality is great! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Roe

customer_reviews.title: High Quality White Boards and Company
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs in the classroom. High quality boards and I love that the set includes individual dry erasers. They will be put to good use in my classroom for years to come. Customer service from seller Jade Active was superb as I received an follow up email after delivery to check if delivery and product met my expectations. I highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Teacher!

customer_reviews.title: These work great! We use everyday for homeschool and they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! We use everyday for homeschool and they fit nicely in my kids work totes. They do have a strong odor from the particle board backing but it's starting to lessen after a few days and I figure the smell will be gone within the month.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Trivia Party Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for trivia nights. The item arrived very quickly and once I received it, I tried out my dry erase markers on them and they worked just great with it. I then proceeded to try out with their erasers and it wiped it off clean. So I cannot wait to use these for the party!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: kids played with these on a recent road trip. perfect size.

customer_reviews.text: really nice and great for using to do math problems with your children or a class since they can be erased without all the dust. Useful for offices too

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These boards exceeded my expectations. They are of high quality. They erase easily with the matching erasers. The set is nicely packaged in a sturdy attractive box. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: so perfect

customer_reviews.title: Loved this Product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Product! I had over 200 kids using them today and they worked great! The erasers are contact and do a great job and the boards held up really well. They are lightweight and easy to hold.

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely get from them again whenever i need stuff like this!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a class, we had a blast using it! Whiteboards are of quality! I will definitely get from them again whenever i need stuff like this!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality erasers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but the erasers are very poor quality. They broke the first time we used them. The boards are great quality though.

customer_reviews.title: Save Paper
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using the product to teach kids. Good way to cut down on paper. Great to also use to write notes and reminders

customer_reviews.title: These boards worked great! They are the perfect size for family game ...
customer_reviews.text: These boards worked great! They are the perfect size for family game night and work well with other arts & crafts projects. I love that it comes with erasers for each board - very convenient. I highly recommend this product for families, teachers, and hobbyists.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The white boards are a great quality and Jade provided excellent customer service."

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size boards for the team building exercise I needed them for. They arrived in a re-usable slim box, which is perfect for storage.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any classroom! These helped my students tremendously as we started covering multi-step equations!

customer_reviews.title: The erasers are also a great addition! That was definitely a selling point for ...
customer_reviews.text: These whiteboards are made very well. They came in well packaged as well as in a cute box that I will keep for storage. The erasers are also a great addition! That was definitely a selling point for me. Will definitely reorder again!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Quality that doesn't wear.
customer_reviews.text: As a med student, I require a whiteboard that can take a beating without losing its quality. These boards are amazing at that and every use feels like the first time which I love. Plus they are so handy they fit perfectly in my book bag.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These whiteboards are very nice. A good price and the set had erasers as well. Good quality!

customer_reviews.title: Quality for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Sturdy. Nice packaging. Come with erasers. Haven’t tried those yet.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great shape! Good value and they erase very well- no stains from dry erase pens. I would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how nice the packaging and quality was
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice the packaging and quality was! I purchased this as a gift, so it was nice that the packaging was durable and well designed. I would buy this item again.

customer_reviews.title: These were great for my classroom and were a perfect fit for ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my classroom and were a perfect fit for book boxes. The erasers are pretty neat but you do need to be careful with them. The felt bottoms will easily peel off but they hot glue right back on and work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Smith

customer_reviews.title: really hard to erase from - I have to use ...
customer_reviews.text: really hard to erase from - I have to use baby wipe to get expo marker residue off. The eraser does not do the job.

customer_reviews.title: but not a bad thing. They are nicely packaged with separate erasers ...
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than I was expecting, but not a bad thing. They are nicely packaged with separate erasers for each board. I also had room to store the markers I bought with them.

customer_reviews.title: Boards are fine, but came curved in so the students like ...
customer_reviews.text: Erasers fall apart quick. Boards are fine, but came curved in so the students like to spin them around in circles instead of writing.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to work with families and individual clients
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to work with families and individual clients. Arrived timely and in perfect condition! I'm excited to use these with my clients.

customer_reviews.title: These boards are a total knock out!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my boxing classes for station markers - they are a real HIT! (har har) Puns aside, they look sharp and feel high quality - totally took my class style up a notch. Would definitely recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is far above what you pay!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! Great value that can't be found anywhere else (lapboards are sooo expensive). The company is very responsive and the product was as described! Would certainly recommend to anyone!!!
